text: 1.9: Ro 8.28; Ef 1.4; 2.8-9; 1 Te 4.7; Ta 3.5; Hi 3.1; 1 Pi 1.20Fhe Bakɨme taagia nza ndigap, nzan kamgim, nza anan gumgi gu mbigi kɨrga. Ana nza mbui tɨvir vhuuiaŋ ndɨrɨgap, nzan kamgi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana fhum guarara, Fhe Bakɨme zumgum kha nuian gu bigi ga muuŋgi, ana fhum guarara ana wo vuzvugɨra, ana nza kora muuŋgiap, nzan kamgi. Ana Krais Zisasan farve panan, ana nza kora muuŋgim, nza anan gumgi gu mbigi ki.
